name: Ultimate Fandom Icon Module
description: A module for those of us that love all of the fandoms on tumblr. The icons are: Sherlock, Harry Potter(Deathly Hallows), Starfleet Insignia(Star Trek), Castiel's Wings(Supernatural), Lungs with a fork and Knife(Hannibal), Arthur's Sword(MERLIN) and the TARDIS(Doctor Who).
